text: Really good selection of toppings! I think their dough is a little better some of the other build your own pizza places. The garlic bread however is terrible. I definitely wouldn't get that again.

text: Lovin the cauliPower crust. Best build your own pizza place i have found. I highly recommend. Also, the customer service at these restaurants is amazing!

text: The pizza was really good, especially with the barbecue sauce. It‚Äôs like a subway but pizza, except that they don‚Äôt charge extra for any of the toppings. There are two sizes of pizza the mega 11‚Äù size and the mini.

name: Nickolas Molina
text: I visit this marvelous  place often since I enjoy the  special atmosphere that is unique to this restaurant. The personel is highly loyal and professional. The service is deeply fast. Also, the food you eat is highly distinguished. I came many times and I was never disappointed. The cost is reasobable. I recommend this place to to all.

name: Yat
text:
Mod Pizza in Los Cerritos Center has a very friendly staff that are willing to help make suggestions even add more toppings to their dishes.
I tried the salads here for the first time and it was very tasty.
They offer a variety of pizza pies and have three choices for salads.

name: Maggie Lin
text: So fresh! Everything is perfect!! Love coming here every time is 100% satisfaction. Should come back more often.

name: Rochelle Gulley
text: It's a good place to go to get a bite. You can create your own pizza. Put WHATEVER they have on your pizza and the choices are abundant.

name: Bob Lee
text: It's like going to Subway, except it's for Pizza, basically you get your pizza anyway you want it, and whatever you want for toppings. Must be 30 or more different things you can put on it, and as much as you want. Crust was perfectly cooked in less then 5 min in there HOT brick oven.

name: Bryan Hong
text: I don't really like giving negative reviews but I've just never had a good experience at any Mod Pizza location including this one. Many people seem to think they are getting a deal because of the unlimited toppings but the pizza here ‚Ä¶More

text: I really enjoyed the pizza here. The flavor excels the other pizza parlor.

name: Ariana Wojcik
text: Gluten and dairy free pizza options! This particular time they overdid the cooking of the crust but usually it is much better.

name: Shontel Abouelezz
text: Great pizza and toppings that you are able to customize. Upbeat and friendly customer service

text: Off the hook!  I can't have gluten or dairy but they still have options for me. Amazing and fun toppings.  Super great,  fresh,  delicious pizza pie.  Go go go!  Not expensive and fun atmosphere.   I'm a Modster.
